configurableConfig.description: When configured, passed-in paths are ignored.
configurableConfig.label: Folder

script:
if [[ -n "${target_path}" ]]; then
  readonly json_args="$(../.common/directory-children 'by_added' "${target_path}")"
elif [[ "${#}" -gt 0 ]]; then
  readonly json_args="$(../.common/directory-children 'by_added' "${@}")"
else
  echo 'Either a valid input or configuration is required' >&2
  exit 1
fi

osascript -l JavaScript -e 'function run(argv) {
  return JSON.parse(argv[0])["alfredworkflow"]["arg"][0]
}' "${json_args}" | tr -d '\n'
taskDescription: Returns most recently added path of configured or passed-in folder
